title: Ep. 85 - The Great John Rexx
description:
Todd, Digs, Gorman, Gumpy, Zito and young Billy held down today's show while Pat is in the Bahamas competing for the NFL in a charity golf tournament and filming content with NFL and NBA legends with the help of Nick, Foxy and Ty.  This was possibly the most educational episode yet as Digs broke out a new segment called "Digs' Actual Real Facts". Todd broke out a new Fact or Fiction and told us a tale of an investigation he helped with on a group of dirty cops and Gorms shared his worst acting experiences.
